title: ,,Attemting to recconect"with 50 ms
body: Did only i have this problem?I ve got 50-60 ping and inside of teamfight,ganking or any other moment og game im getting ,,attempting to recconect" and after a moment it is repairing.(it is not bcs of internet)

replies.body: No helping these kids Porocles... that all insist its not on the end... and we both know 99% of the time it is

It sounds like you might have a weak connection to the game server, so you can't communicate or receive information on everything happening during that period.  I recommend running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)  to get an overview of what's going on with your connection.  You will also get a series of troubleshooting steps that should specifically help resolve your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions.
